name: shabam
description: A replica of the popular music-recognition app Shazam

scripts.rm-services:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml rm proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.start:dev--recreate: npm run rm-services:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.rm-services:dev-prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev-prod.yml rm proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.start:dev-prod--recreate: npm run rm-services:dev-prod && npm run start:dev-prod

author: Alexander Greff
